entry.title: Friday: Fog dissipating. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Fog dissipating this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this morning except gusting to 50 near Cape Race late this morning and this afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 3 except minus 9 inland.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northeast 20 km/h except gusting to 50 near Cape Race this evening. Wind becoming light late this evening then becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 3 except minus 9 inland. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High plus 4.
